parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Remote Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Disables unit's AV terminal(s) connecting to UAV.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[disableUAVConnectability]] [uav, checkAllItems]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> uav: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> checkAllItems: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to disable all terminals in unit's inventory, [[false]] to only disable the currently assigned terminal.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myUnit [[disableUAVConnectability]] [myUav, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isUAVConnectable]], [[enableUAVConnectability]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 15, 2018 - 20:13 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:PingWing|PingWing]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command has effect on a UAV terminal, not on whether a unit is able to connect to a UAV or not.<br>
When a unit gets a new UAV terminal, the unit will be able to connect to the UAV again, unless this command is executed again.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
